about_the_game:
Whether you're a cleaning enthusiast or just looking for a fun way to spend your time, The game offers an engaging and humorous look into the behind-the-scenes lives of your favorite gaming personalities. Get ready to clean up and shine in the world of streaming!

Dynamic Environments

Each streamer's room offers a different level of mess and items to interact with, ranging from pizza boxes and soft drink cans to high-tech gaming gear and collectibles.

Time Challenges

Race against the clock to clean up before the next live stream starts. Earn extra money for speed and efficiency.

Customizable Tools

Unlock and upgrade cleaning tools like turbo vacuums, super sprays, and robotic assistants to tackle tougher messes faster.

Streamer Requests

Meet specific demands from streamers to increase your reputation and unlock new cleaning gigs. Each streamer has unique needs and preferences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Phenom
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer

short_description: Restore order and cleanliness to the rooms of famous Gaming Streamers after their epic gaming sessions. Find artefacts, explore streamers life. Play co-op with your friends.
